problems.title: Sum of Even Numbers
problems.description:
Write a program to find the sum of all even numbers between 1 to n using a while loop.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
A single integer representing the sum.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
6

Explanation:
Even numbers are 2 and 4. Sum = 2 + 4 = 6.
hintsList: Initialize a sum variable to 0 and a counter to 1.
Check if counter is even, if so add to sum.
